entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening then changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
